level.text: The Department shall maintain a record for each administrative review offered or held. Each administrative review record shall include:
Documentation of the request for a fair hearing;
Documentation of the notice of the administrative review;
Evidence considered at the administrative review, if held;
All status reports issued to the Office of Administrative Hearings; and

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 6438 (July 23, 2010)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice Emergency Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 11353 (November 26, 2010)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Emergency Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 3007 (April 8, 2011)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 7442, 7503 (August 19, 2011).
